column1: Down Trains arriving at Harlow Mill need to reverse in the Down platform in order to gain access to Harlow MillFreight Yard

Harlow Mill Reception is part of Harlow Mill Freight Yard and cannot be used for pathing stops (A stops) in trains.Trains may only enter Harlow Mill Reception when accepted by groundstaff to serve one of the terminals.
